__e: I couldn't wait to talk with you, Michael, to thank you, and to tell you I owe it all to you that I've gotten this far.
Yeah I'd longed to write once, but now I just do it to work out everything else.
I've been sure of something since this morning and I've been longing to tell you.
I've been thinking about you all week.
I'm so sorry for everything. My darling, you're such a child.
A day has not passed that I have not yearned for you.
I couldn't wait to talk with you, Michael, to thank you, and to tell you I owe it all to you that I've gotten this far.
I've been sure of something since this morning and I've been longing to tell you.
Yeah I'd longed to write once, but now I just do it to work out everything else.
I can not tell you how often I've wished for this day to come.
In fact, I'd give you a smack if I didn't want to kiss you so much I could burst!
It's been a real long wait this is our second date.
It's filthy, the food was disgusting. Even the kids were dying to get back, so, you know.
I was hoping to find you wasted away with homesickness.
I knew deep down you were just homesick.
